@ChrisHaworth368 @COORY4RYAN @LibDemAus 1/
Great point Chris. Housing affordability is a problem.

It's a problem is people say "I MUST live in Sydney or Melbourne" where prices are out of reach for most now.

What we're seeing is the market at work. People are moving to regional towns now.

..rents rising again in all cities, including Melbourne and Sydney which had been hard hit by the absence of foreign students during the Covid lockdowns. A revival of migration will accelerate those rises.
